WorkItem.Description:
Bad things seems to start happening with you update equipped items from WoWHead and/or the Armory.
In most cases, while the item icon is shown, no item is shown as equipped on the right side graph.
This implies to me that there may be dangling pointers to deallocated objects when you update equipped items.
Also, doing this seems to make the application unstable shortly thereafter.

Comments.Message:
Repro Steps:
Load a character up from a file or from the armory.
Select one of the equipped items for that character
Using the popup menu, update that item from WoWhead or the Armory.
Notice that no item is now highlighted as the current one on the right side list of items for that slot.
